title: Bad Advice
lyrics:
I've been places
All I'd ever wanted
The world dressed to seem kind
I've played aces
But playing wasn't all that
I'd believe my eyes



I'll give you a free ride, baby

I'll drive you around

I know it's hard to take me

Sure I'll drive you down



I've changed faces

Just behind the curtain

Take me for surprise

Paid for my time

Looking at the pictures

Looks so nice to be alive



I'll give you a free ride, baby

I'll drive you around

I know it's hard to take me

Sure I'll drive you down



There's no price

There's no price

Bad advice

Bad advice



I'll give you a free ride, baby

I'll drive you around

I know it's hard to take me

Sure I'll drive you down
